channel.title: Geometry on EduGovNet.com
channel.description: Recent content in Geometry on EduGovNet.com

item.title: Spheres, Distances, Maps and More!
item.description: In this article we combine some Linear Algebra with a bit of geometry to make some real-world calculations about finding the nearest line to two or more points on a map. We’ve also implemented a tool that uses those calculations to fit a great circle to two or more points on the globe. Check it out!
